entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Kincardine
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:52 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Goderich 09:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -0.8°C

Humidity: 87 %

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming north 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
